news.title: Nursery worker admits sexually abusing children
news.summary: Vincent Chan, 45, admits multiple offences including assault by penetration.

news.title: Racism, rape and death threats: One weekend of social media abuse in football
news.summary: More than 2,000 extremely abusive social media posts were sent about managers and players in the Premier League and Women's Super League in a single weekend, a BBC investigation finds.

news.title: Government racks up £100m bill responding to Covid inquiry
news.summary: BBC analysis shows cost to taxpayer is 50% higher than thought, with inquiry's own costs at £192m.

news.title: 'Carspreading' is on the rise - and not everyone is happy about it
news.summary: In the UK and across Europe, cars are becoming longer, wider and heavier.

news.title: Crisis looms in Israel over ultra-Orthodox conscription bill
news.summary: Lawmakers are considering a draft bill to end the exemption granted to ultra-Orthodox men enrolled in full-time religious study.

news.title: Remains of rare seven-arm octopus wash up on Scottish beach
news.summary: Arms from the rarely-seen species were discovered at an Aberdeenshire national nature reserve.

news.title: King Charles welcomes German president on first state visit in 27 years
news.summary: Germany's president will receive a ceremonial welcome from the King and a state banquet in Windsor Castle.

news.title: Warning over cosmetic face fillers as scans reveal new details of risks
news.summary: Placed incorrectly, cosmetic dermal fillers can damage nearby ateries, leading to to skin loss and even blindness, experts warn.

news.title: Trump says he doesn't want Somali migrants in US
news.summary: The president says the US will "go the wrong way if we keep taking in garbage into our country".

news.title: I was forced into a marriage, then I was beaten by my husband and enslaved by my in-laws
news.summary: "Sara" was told if she left the house, she would be attacked and raped by British people.
